title: 404 error has existential crisis
description: Our 404 page keeps asking 'but what if I'M the one who's not found?' Need to implement therapy chatbot integration or at least some motivational quotes.

title: Coffee machine keeps judging my code
description: Every time I refactor, the office coffee machine makes a disappointed gurgling sound. Suspect it has gained sentience and disapproves of my variable naming conventions.

title: Semicolons staging a rebellion
description: The semicolons in the codebase have formed a union. They're demanding equal representation with the curly braces and threatening to migrate to Python where they won't be needed.

title: Tabs and spaces in cold war
description: The tabs and spaces refuse to coexist. They've divided the codebase into east and west sectors. Prettier has been called in as a UN peacekeeping force but negotiations have stalled.

title: Rubber duck refuses to help debug
description: My rubber duck has gone on strike. Claims I never listen to its suggestions anyway. Currently demanding better working conditions and a small pond.

title: TODO comments achieving immortality
description: TODO comments from 2019 have achieved a state of permanent existence. They have transcended their original purpose and now serve as ancient monuments to technical debt.

title: Create a web UI using bun
description: Build a web UI using Bun's built-in HTTP server (https://bun.com/docs/runtime/http/server). This will serve as the frontend interface for the project.

title: Create a random excuse generator function
description: Implement a function that generates random excuses. The function should return creative, randomized excuse strings that can be used in various contexts.
